1.title: Parts of Speech
1.content: There are 8 parts of speech: noun, pronoun, verb, adjective, adverb, preposition, conjunction, interjection.

2.title: Tenses
2.content: Tenses express the time of action. There are three main tenses: past, present, future. Each has four forms.

3.title: Articles
3.content: Articles define a noun as specific or unspecific. 'A' and 'an' are indefinite; 'the' is definite.
